packages.name: Kerala Delight
packages.description: Experience the serene backwaters, lush tea gardens, and rich cultural heritage of God's Own Country. This comprehensive tour covers the best of Kerala including houseboat stays and spice plantation visits.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kochi
itinerary.description: Arrive at Kochi airport. Visit Chinese Fishing Nets, St. Francis Church, and Mattancherry Palace. Evening Kathakali dance performance.

itinerary.title: Kochi to Munnar
itinerary.description: Drive to Munnar (4 hours). En route visit Cheeyappara Waterfalls. Check into hotel and evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Munnar Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Eravikulam National Park, Tea Museum, Mattupetty Dam, and Echo Point. Experience tea plantation walk.

itinerary.title: Munnar to Alleppey
itinerary.description: Drive to Alleppey. Board traditional houseboat and cruise through backwaters. Overnight stay on houseboat.

itinerary.title: Alleppey to Kochi
itinerary.description: Disembark from houseboat. Visit local markets and spice shops. Evening departure preparations.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to Kochi airport for onward journey. Tour concludes with beautiful memories.

inclusions: 1 night houseboat stay with full board
All transfers and sightseeing by AC vehicle
exclusions: Any items not mentioned in inclusions
notes: Best time to visit: October to March
Carry light cotton clothes and comfortable walking shoes
Keep original ID proof handy for check-ins

packages.name: Golden Triangle Classic
packages.description: Discover India's royal heritage through Delhi's monuments, Agra's Taj Mahal, and Jaipur's palaces. This classic tour showcases the best of North Indian culture, architecture, and history.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Delhi
itinerary.description: Arrive in Delhi. Visit India Gate, President's House, and Connaught Place. Evening at leisure for shopping.

itinerary.title: Delhi Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Full day tour of Old and New Delhi. Visit Red Fort, Jama Masjid, Raj Ghat, Humayun's Tomb, and Qutub Minar.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Agra
itinerary.description: Drive to Agra (3 hours). Visit Taj Mahal at sunset. Check into hotel and evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Agra to Jaipur via Fatehpur Sikri
itinerary.description: Visit Agra Fort in morning. Drive to Jaipur via Fatehpur Sikri (5 hours). Evening arrival in Jaipur.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Amber Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and Jantar Mantar. Evening shopping at local bazaars.

itinerary.title: Jaipur to Delhi
itinerary.description: Morning at leisure. Optional visit to Birla Temple. Drive back to Delhi (5 hours). Evening departure preparations.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for onward journey. Tour concludes with unforgettable memories of India's golden triangle.

notes: Taj Mahal is closed on Fridays
Best time to visit: October to March
Keep passport copy for hotel check-ins

packages.name: Himalayan Adventure
packages.description: Adventure-packed journey through the majestic Himalayas featuring trekking, river rafting, paragliding, and stunning mountain vistas. Perfect for thrill-seekers and nature lovers.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Shimla
itinerary.description: Arrive in Shimla. Check into hotel. Evening walk on Mall Road and visit Christ Church. Acclimatization day.

itinerary.title: Shimla to Manali
itinerary.description: Scenic drive to Manali (7 hours) through Kullu Valley. Check into hotel and evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Manali Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Hadimba Temple, Manu Temple, and Vashisht Hot Springs. Evening paragliding session (weather permitting).

itinerary.title: Solang Valley Adventure
itinerary.description: Full day at Solang Valley. Activities include zorbing, skiing (seasonal), and ropeway ride. Adventure sports day.

itinerary.title: Rohtang Pass Excursion
itinerary.description: Early morning trip to Rohtang Pass (13,050 ft). Snow activities and mountain photography. Return to Manali.

itinerary.title: River Rafting & Trekking
itinerary.description: River rafting on Beas River. Afternoon trek to nearby waterfalls. Evening bonfire and BBQ.

itinerary.title: Manali to Shimla
itinerary.description: Drive back to Shimla. Evening shopping for local handicrafts and woolens.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport/railway station. Tour concludes with thrilling adventure memories.

notes: Carry warm clothing and trekking shoes
Travel insurance mandatory for adventure activities

packages.name: Goa Beach Paradise
packages.description: Relax on pristine beaches, explore Portuguese heritage, enjoy water sports, and experience Goa's vibrant nightlife. Perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Goa
itinerary.hotel: Novotel Goa Dona Sylvia Resort or Similar
itinerary.activities: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, Calangute Beach visit
itinerary.description: Arrive at Goa airport. Transfer to hotel in North Goa. Check-in at the hotel (standard time approx. 1400 hrs). Evening visit to Calangute Beach and local market exploration. Welcome dinner at the hotel.

itinerary.title: North Goa Exploration
itinerary.hotel: Novotel Goa Dona Sylvia Resort or Similar
itinerary.activities: Baga Beach, Anjuna Beach, Fort Aguada, Water sports
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast at hotel. Full day exploration of North Goa. Visit the famous Baga Beach and Anjuna Beach. Explore the historic Fort Aguada with panoramic views. Experience thrilling water sports at Baga Beach. Evening at Saturday Night Market.

itinerary.title: Old Goa Heritage Tour
itinerary.hotel: Novotel Goa Dona Sylvia Resort or Similar
itinerary.activities: Basilica of Bom Jesus, Se Cathedral, Spice plantation
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast at hotel. Explore the rich Portuguese heritage of Old Goa. Visit Basilica of Bom Jesus, Se Cathedral, and Church of St. Francis. Experience traditional spice plantation tour with authentic Goan lunch and cultural performances.

itinerary.title: South Goa Discovery
itinerary.hotel: Novotel Goa Dona Sylvia Resort or Similar
itinerary.activities: Palolem Beach, Colva Beach, Dolphin cruise
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast at hotel. Discover the serene beauty of South Goa. Visit pristine Palolem Beach and Colva Beach. Explore Margao market for local shopping. Evening dolphin watching cruise with breathtaking sunset views and dinner on board.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning breakfast at hotel. Final beach relaxation and last-minute shopping for souvenirs. Check-out from hotel. Transfer to Goa airport for departure with beautiful beach memories.

notes: Best time to visit: November to February
Respect local customs at religious sites

packages.name: Exotic Bali
packages.description: Discover Bali's spiritual temples, lush rice terraces, pristine beaches, and vibrant culture. Experience traditional ceremonies, art villages, and stunning sunsets.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bali
itinerary.description: Arrive at Ngurah Rai Airport. Transfer to Ubud hotel. Evening at leisure exploring Ubud market and local cafes.

itinerary.title: Ubud Cultural Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Tegalalang Rice Terraces, Tirta Empul Temple, and traditional art villages. Coffee plantation tour and tasting.

itinerary.title: Ubud to Kuta
itinerary.description: Transfer to Kuta. Visit Tanah Lot Temple for sunset. Check into beachfront hotel and evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Water Sports & Beach Day
itinerary.description: Water sports at Tanjung Benoa. Visit Uluwatu Temple and traditional Kecak dance performance at sunset.

itinerary.title: Seminyak & Shopping
itinerary.description: Explore Seminyak beaches and boutique shopping. Spa treatment and traditional Balinese massage. Farewell dinner.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Last-minute shopping at local markets. Transfer to airport for departure with beautiful Bali memories.

notes: Visa on arrival available for Indians
Carry modest clothing for temple visits
English is widely spoken in tourist areas

packages.name: Dubai Luxury Escape
packages.description: Experience Dubai's luxury shopping, towering skyscrapers, desert safaris, and world-class attractions. A perfect blend of modern marvels and traditional culture.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Dubai
itinerary.description: Arrive at Dubai International Airport. Transfer to luxury hotel. Evening Dubai Fountain show and Burj Khalifa visit.

itinerary.title: Dubai City Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Dubai Museum, Gold Souk, Spice Souk, and Jumeirah Mosque. Abra ride across Dubai Creek. Palm Jumeirah monorail.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari Adventure
itinerary.description: Desert safari with dune bashing, camel riding, and traditional BBQ dinner. Belly dance and Tanoura show under stars.

itinerary.title: Abu Dhabi Day Trip
itinerary.description: Full day Abu Dhabi tour. Visit Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, Emirates Palace, and Ferrari World theme park.

itinerary.title: Shopping & Departure
itinerary.description: Shopping at Dubai Mall and Mall of Emirates. Last-minute sightseeing. Transfer to airport for departure.

notes: Modest dress code for mosque visits

packages.name: Thailand Grand Tour
packages.description: Explore Thailand's bustling capital, beautiful beaches, ornate temples, floating markets, and vibrant nightlife. Includes island hopping and cultural experiences.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bangkok
itinerary.description: Arrive at Suvarnabhumi Airport. Transfer to hotel. Evening visit to Chatuchak Night Market for shopping and street food.

itinerary.title: Bangkok Temple Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Wat Pho (Reclining Buddha), Wat Arun (Temple of Dawn), and Grand Palace. Long-tail boat ride on Chao Phraya River.

itinerary.title: Floating Market & Safari World
itinerary.description: Damnoen Saduak floating market tour. Afternoon at Safari World with marine park shows and wildlife safari.

itinerary.title: Bangkok to Pattaya
itinerary.description: Transfer to Pattaya (2 hours). Check into beachfront hotel. Evening Alcazar Cabaret Show and Walking Street exploration.

itinerary.title: Coral Island Trip
itinerary.description: Full day Coral Island tour with speedboat. Water sports, parasailing, and beach relaxation. Seafood lunch on island.

itinerary.title: Pattaya to Bangkok
itinerary.description: Transfer back to Bangkok. Last-minute shopping at MBK Center or Siam Paragon. Thai massage experience.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure. Tour concludes with amazing Thailand memories and cultural experiences.

notes: Visa on arrival available for Indians

packages.name: Singapore Family Fun
packages.description: Family-friendly Singapore tour featuring Universal Studios, Gardens by the Bay, Marina Bay Sands, and cultural districts. Perfect blend of fun and sightseeing.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Singapore
itinerary.description: Arrive at Changi Airport. Transfer to hotel. Evening visit to Marina Bay Sands SkyPark and light show.

itinerary.title: City Tour & Gardens by the Bay
itinerary.description: Singapore city tour including Merlion Park, Chinatown, and Little India. Evening at Gardens by the Bay with Supertree Grove.

itinerary.title: Sentosa Island Adventure
itinerary.description: Full day at Sentosa Island. Universal Studios Singapore with thrilling rides and shows. Evening at Sentosa beaches.

itinerary.title: Singapore Zoo & Shopping
itinerary.description: Morning at Singapore Zoo and River Safari. Afternoon shopping at Orchard Road and ION Orchard mall.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Last-minute shopping at Changi Airport (duty-free). Departure with wonderful family memories from Singapore.

notes: Visa-free entry for Indian tourists (30 days)

packages.name: Europe Grand Discovery
packages.description: Comprehensive Europe tour covering France's romantic capital, Switzerland's scenic beauty, and Italy's eternal city. Experience art, culture, cuisine, and breathtaking landscapes.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paris
itinerary.description: Arrive at Charles de Gaulle Airport. Transfer to hotel. Evening Seine River cruise with dinner and illuminated monuments.

itinerary.title: Paris Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, Notre Dame Cathedral, and Champs-Élysées. Evening at Montmartre and Sacré-Cœur.

itinerary.title: Paris - Versailles Day Trip
itinerary.description: Day trip to Palace of Versailles and gardens. Return to Paris for evening at leisure and optional Moulin Rouge show.

itinerary.title: Paris to Zurich
itinerary.description: High-speed train to Zurich. City orientation tour including Lake Zurich and Old Town. Swiss welcome dinner.

itinerary.title: Zurich to Interlaken
itinerary.description: Scenic train journey to Interlaken. Jungfraujoch excursion - 'Top of Europe' with snow activities and mountain views.

itinerary.title: Swiss Alps Adventure
itinerary.description: Mount Titlis cable car ride and glacier experience. Visit Lucerne with Chapel Bridge and Lake Lucerne boat cruise.

itinerary.title: Switzerland to Rome
itinerary.description: Scenic train journey through Alps to Rome. Evening walking tour of illuminated Rome and Italian dinner.

itinerary.title: Rome Classical Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Colosseum, Roman Forum, Palatine Hill, and Capitoline Museums. Evening at Trevi Fountain and Spanish Steps.

itinerary.title: Vatican City Tour
itinerary.description: Vatican Museums, Sistine Chapel, and St. Peter's Basilica. Afternoon exploring Trastevere district and local cuisine.

itinerary.title: Rome Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Pantheon, Piazza Navona, and Villa Borghese. Shopping at Via del Corso and farewell dinner with Italian opera.

itinerary.title: Rome Free Day
itinerary.description: Free day for personal exploration, shopping, or optional day trips. Evening departure preparations.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to Fiumicino Airport for departure. Tour concludes with lifetime memories of European grandeur.

packages.name: Andaman Island Paradise
packages.description: Pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, coral reefs, and historical sites. Perfect for water sports, snorkeling, and experiencing untouched natural beauty.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Port Blair
itinerary.description: Arrive at Veer Savarkar Airport. Visit Cellular Jail and attend Sound & Light show. Evening at Corbyn's Cove Beach.

itinerary.title: Port Blair to Havelock
itinerary.description: Ferry to Havelock Island. Check into beach resort. Visit Radhanagar Beach (Asia's best beach). Sunset photography.

itinerary.title: Havelock Water Activities
itinerary.description: Snorkeling at Elephant Beach. Water sports including kayaking and jet skiing. Evening beach relaxation and bonfire.

itinerary.title: Havelock to Neil Island
itinerary.description: Ferry to Neil Island. Visit Bharatpur Beach, Laxmanpur Beach, and Natural Bridge. Coral viewing and swimming.

itinerary.title: Neil to Port Blair
itinerary.description: Return to Port Blair. Visit Samudrika Naval Marine Museum and local markets. Last-minute souvenir shopping.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure. Tour concludes with beautiful island memories and pristine beach experiences.

packages.name: Ladakh High Altitude Expedition
packages.description: Ultimate high-altitude adventure through moonscapes, ancient monasteries, highest motorable passes, and pristine lakes. Experience Ladakhi culture and Buddhist heritage.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Leh
itinerary.description: Arrive at Leh airport (11,500 ft). Complete rest for acclimatization. Light evening walk in Leh market. Oxygen and medical check.

itinerary.title: Leh Acclimatization
itinerary.description: Gentle sightseeing: Shanti Stupa, Leh Palace, and local monasteries. Traditional Ladakhi lunch. Evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Leh to Nubra Valley
itinerary.description: Drive to Nubra Valley via Khardung La Pass (18,390 ft) - world's highest motorable road. Check into camps in Hunder.

itinerary.title: Nubra Valley Exploration
itinerary.description: Camel safari on double-humped Bactrian camels. Visit Diskit Monastery and giant Buddha statue. Sand dunes photography.

itinerary.title: Nubra to Pangong Lake
itinerary.description: Drive to Pangong Lake via Shyok River route. Camp near the famous blue lake at 14,270 ft altitude.

itinerary.title: Pangong Lake to Leh
itinerary.description: Sunrise at Pangong Lake. Return to Leh via Chang La Pass (17,590 ft). Evening rest and celebration dinner.

itinerary.title: Monastery Circuit
itinerary.description: Visit Hemis, Thiksey, and Shey monasteries. Learn about Buddhist culture and Ladakhi traditions. Local interaction.

itinerary.title: Leh Local Exploration
itinerary.description: Free day for personal exploration, shopping for Pashmina shawls, and last-minute photography. Farewell dinner.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure. Tour concludes with unforgettable high-altitude adventure memories.

packages.name: Royal Rajasthan Heritage
packages.description: Experience royal Rajasthan's magnificent palaces, desert safaris, colorful markets, and rich cultural heritage. Stay in heritage hotels and witness traditional performances.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jaipur
itinerary.description: Arrive in Pink City. Check into heritage hotel. Evening visit to local markets and Rajasthani dinner with folk show.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Amber Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and Jantar Mantar. Elephant ride at Amber Fort. Traditional craft workshop.

itinerary.title: Jaipur to Jodhpur
itinerary.description: Drive to Blue City Jodhpur (5 hours). Check into hotel. Evening visit to Jodhpur fort and sunset views.

itinerary.title: Jodhpur Exploration
itinerary.description: Explore Mehrangarh Fort, Jaswant Thada, and local blue-painted houses. Flying fox adventure at fort (optional).

itinerary.title: Jodhpur to Jaisalmer
itinerary.description: Drive to Golden City Jaisalmer (5 hours). Check into heritage hotel. Evening walk in golden sandstone streets.

itinerary.title: Jaisalmer Fort & Desert
itinerary.description: Explore Jaisalmer Fort, Patwon Ki Haveli. Afternoon desert safari with camel ride and overnight desert camping.

itinerary.title: Jaisalmer to Udaipur
itinerary.description: Drive to City of Lakes Udaipur (8 hours). Check into lake-facing hotel. Evening boat ride on Lake Pichola.

itinerary.title: Udaipur Palace Tour
itinerary.description: Visit City Palace complex, Jagdish Temple, and Saheliyon Ki Bari. Sunset at Monsoon Palace. Royal dinner experience.

itinerary.title: Udaipur Cultural Day
itinerary.description: Visit local art galleries, handicraft workshops, and spice markets. Optional cooking class. Cultural performance evening.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport/railway station. Tour concludes with royal memories and cultural experiences of Rajasthan.

notes: Heritage hotels may have old-world charm
Respect local customs and photography rules

packages.name: Maldives Honeymoon Bliss
packages.description: Ultimate romantic getaway with overwater villas, private beaches, couple spa treatments, underwater dining, and sunset cruises. Perfect for honeymooners.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paradise
itinerary.description: Arrive at Male Airport. Seaplane transfer to luxury resort. Welcome drink and check into overwater villa. Sunset dinner on private deck.

itinerary.title: Romantic Water Activities
itinerary.description: Snorkeling in coral gardens. Couple's dolphin watching cruise. Private beach picnic lunch. Sunset fishing expedition.

itinerary.title: Spa & Relaxation Day
itinerary.description: Couple's spa treatment at overwater spa. Private yoga session on beach. Underwater restaurant dining experience. Stargazing from villa.

itinerary.title: Adventure & Romance
itinerary.description: Scuba diving or glass-bottom boat tour. Private sandbank excursion with champagne lunch. Traditional Maldivian cultural show.

itinerary.title: Farewell to Paradise
itinerary.description: Final breakfast overlooking lagoon. Last-minute relaxation and photography. Seaplane transfer back to Male for departure.

notes: Visa on arrival for Indian citizens
Respect Islamic traditions on local islands

packages.name: Kashmir Valley Beauty
packages.description: Experience the paradise on earth with Dal Lake houseboats, snow-capped mountains, meadows of flowers, and Mughal gardens. Includes shikara rides and mountain adventures.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar
itinerary.description: Arrive at Srinagar airport. Check into luxury houseboat on Dal Lake. Evening shikara ride and floating market visit.

itinerary.title: Srinagar Mughal Gardens
itinerary.description: Visit Nishat Bagh, Shalimar Bagh, and Chashme Shahi gardens. Explore local carpet and handicraft workshops. Evening on houseboat.

itinerary.title: Srinagar to Gulmarg
itinerary.description: Drive to Gulmarg (Meadow of Flowers). Gondola cable car ride to Apharwat Peak. Snow activities and mountain photography.

itinerary.title: Gulmarg Adventure Day
itinerary.description: Adventure activities: skiing (seasonal), sledging, or hiking. Visit St. Mary's Church. Evening bonfire and local music.

itinerary.title: Gulmarg to Pahalgam
itinerary.description: Drive to Pahalgam (Valley of Shepherds) via saffron fields. Check into hotel. Evening walk along Lidder River.

itinerary.title: Pahalgam Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Betaab Valley, Aru Valley, and Chandanwari. Optional pony rides. Traditional Kashmiri Wazwan dinner experience.

itinerary.title: Return to Srinagar & Departure
itinerary.description: Drive back to Srinagar. Last-minute shopping for saffron and Kashmiri handicrafts. Transfer to airport for departure.

notes: Carry warm clothes even in summer

packages.name: Japan Cherry Blossom Special
packages.description: Experience Japan during cherry blossom season with traditional temples, modern cities, bullet trains, cultural ceremonies, and authentic Japanese cuisine.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Tokyo
itinerary.description: Arrive at Narita Airport. Transfer to hotel in Shibuya. Evening explore neon-lit districts and traditional izakaya dinner.

itinerary.title: Tokyo Modern & Traditional
itinerary.description: Visit Senso-ji Temple, Imperial Palace Gardens (cherry blossoms), and Tokyo Skytree. Experience sumo wrestling demonstration.

itinerary.title: Tokyo Day Trip
itinerary.description: Day trip to Nikko for Toshogu Shrine and natural beauty. Return to Tokyo for evening in Harajuku and Omotesando.

itinerary.title: Tokyo to Kyoto
itinerary.description: Bullet train to Kyoto. Visit Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion) and philosopher's path with cherry blossoms. Traditional ryokan stay.

itinerary.title: Kyoto Cultural Immersion
itinerary.description: Visit Fushimi Inari Shrine, Gion district for geisha spotting, and participate in tea ceremony. Bamboo grove walk.

itinerary.title: Kyoto to Osaka
itinerary.description: Travel to Osaka. Visit Osaka Castle surrounded by cherry blossoms. Explore Dotonbori district and street food culture.

itinerary.title: Nara Day Trip
itinerary.description: Day trip to Nara for deer park and Todaiji Temple. Return to Osaka for farewell dinner and shopping.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Last-minute shopping in Osaka. Transfer to Kansai Airport for departure with beautiful Japanese memories.

notes: Cherry blossom season: late March to early May

packages.name: Dubai Burg
packages.destinations: La Qunita / Sea View or Similar
packages.description:
Book 3* Howard Johnson and Upgrade to 4* La Quinta Hotel
 01 child below 8-year travels free on Child No Bed Basis
inclusions: 04 nights stay at the selected hotel option or similar in Dubai.
Airport / hotel / airport transfers Dubai on (SIC Basis)
La Qunita / Sea View or Similar
Airport / hotel / airport transfers Dubai on (SIC Basis)
Arrive at Dubai - Marina Dhow Cruise with Buffet Dinner (SIC basis)
Half Day City Tour of Dubai (SIC basis),
Desert Safari with BBQ Dinner, Belly dance, Tanoora show and many more activities
Travel Insurance (Valid for the age group till 60 Yrs.)
exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary.
Any tips for guide and Driver
Anything not mentioned in the inclusions.
Pre and Post tour services and cost
Pre and Post tour services and cost
Expenditure of a personal nature (Such as uses of Mini - Bar and Refrigerator, laundry service, telephone call,
Hotel promotional rates not valid during Black out Period / Surcharge Dates / Stop Sales on Hotel
Black Out Dates Surcharge - 01 JUN - 10 JUN EID AL ADHA
The rates are valid for a minimum of 02 adults always travelling together

itinerary.title: Arrival in Dubai
itinerary.description: Arrive at Dubai International Airport, transfer to hotel. In the evening, enjoy a relaxing Dhow Cruise with dinner on Dubai Creek.

itinerary.title: Dubai City Tour & Burj Khalifa
itinerary.description: Explore the city highlights: Jumeirah Mosque, Burj Al Arab (outside), Atlantis, and visit the iconic Burj Khalifa observation deck.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari
itinerary.description: Enjoy thrilling desert adventures and traditional performances under the stars.

itinerary.title: Day at Leisure / Optional Tour
itinerary.description: Relax or choose to explore nearby cities or theme parks.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out and transfer to the airport for your flight home.
